Literature.Title: AP-57/C10orf99 is a new type of mutifunctional antimicrobial peptide.
Literature.Author: Yang M, Tang M, Ma X, Yang L, He J, Peng X, Guo G, Zhou L, Luo N, Yuan Z, Tong A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MEC=21.50µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MEC=>200µg/ml),Actinomyces sp.(MEC=12.33µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MEC=73.32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MEC=86.45µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi RE88(MEC=91.69µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MEC=>200µg/ml),Candida albicans CMCC 98001(MEC=>200µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 16404(MEC=28.55µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC 2601(MEC=>200µg/ml),Mycoplasma hominis(MEC=4.77µg/ml),Lentivirus(MEC=16.50µg/ml),Human Adenovirus AdV-5(MEC=>200µg/ml)
